name: You're Toast (ohcurtains)
description:
Collect bread to shoot at a growing mob of toasters. Collect their bodies for health, but don't get too close to the mob! Shoot and collect as many toasters as you can to try and beat your high score!

Original music and art!

WASD to Move

Left Mouse Button to Aim and Shoot.

ESCAPE to Pause.

Written in C++ in one week as an entry to the OneLoneCoder Game Jam 2020. https://itch.io/jam/olc-codejam-2020

Requirements:

Windows 10, or Linux (using Wine).

No obligation to donate. All proceeds go towards a local charity.

Credits:

Written using the Pixel Game Engine by javidx9 and the OneLoneCoder community.
 https://github.com/OneLoneCoder/olcPixelGameEngine/wiki

Thanks to Moros and Gusgo99 for help with the SoLoud library.

Thanks to Tutas for tips and feedback on the art.

Thanks to DWDev for feedback on the music and the FL Studio tricks.

Thanks to the OneLoneCoder community for playtesting, feedback, advice and being great.

Contact:

Code available at https://github.com/tylerjamesmiles/You-reToast

If you're looking for original music or art for your game, you can contact me at tylerjamesmiles@gmail.com
